调查显示，美国对儿童疫苗要求的看法发生了变化唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）总统在竞选期间威胁要对儿童进行学校疫苗的规定，一项新调查发现，近四分之三的美国成年人支持要求儿童接种可预防的疾病，例如麻疹，腮腺炎和风疹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/survey-reveals-shift-shift-shift-in-us-views-on-childhood-childhood-vaccine-vaccine-requirnements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/survey-reveals-shift-shift-shift-in-sin-us-views-on-childhood-childhood-vaccine-vaccine-requirements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fcac8b8-c4e5-4834-B846-063DF2459C05 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 01:03:14 -0500 Survey reveals shift in U.S. views on childhood vaccine requirements

Trilobio在SLAS2025介绍了全劳动自动化平台Trilobio是用于推进生物学研究的整个实验室自动化解决方案的开发商，今天在实验室自动化和筛选会议会议上，SLAS2025与飞行员客户数据一起介绍了其全面的机器人技术，实验室设备和软件平台的首个版本，并展示了该平台的能力推进研究工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/trilobio-intrododuces-whole-loboration-automation-automation-platform-atform-at-slas2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/trilobio-intrododuces-whole-lale-laboration-automation-automation-platform-at-slas2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cc4b17f-6463-4484-a93d-b662d51137d0 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 23:56:00 -0500 Trilobio introduces whole-laboratory automation platform at SLAS2025
